The board

  • dices (list) – a list of all the dices

  • buttons (list) – a list of all the buttons

  • player (int) – current player

  • players (list) – list of all the players

check_all_dices_locked()[source]

Checks if all the dices are locked, if they are it returns True.

Returns:

If all the dices are locked it returns True, else False

Return type:

Bool

Example:

check_all_dices_locked(), return True

Creates all the objects

create_menu()[source]

Creates the menu

create_players()[source]

Creates the rest of the players(the first two are hardcoded in)

draw()[source]

Draws all the objects in the drawable_objects list

draw_names()[source]

Draws all the players

get_button(x, y)[source]

Gets coordinates of the click of the mouse and checks if the click is on a button. If it is it returns what button it is on.

Parameters:

  • x (int) – x coordinates.

  • y (int) – y coordinates.

Returns:

If the coordinates are on a button it returns the button it is on.

Return type:

Button

Example:

get_button(100,100), return Button

get_dice(x, y)[source]

Gets coordinates of the click of the mouse and checks if the click is on a dice. If it is it returns what dice it is on.

Parameters:

  • x (int) – x coordinates

  • y (int) – y coordinates

Returns:

If the coordinates are on a dice it returns the dice value

Return type:

int

Example:

get_dice(100,100), return 2

get_position()[source]

Gets the position of the mouse

Returns:

returns the coordinates of the mouse

Return type:

(int,int)

Example:

get_position(), returns (100,78)

Hides the keep dices and reset dices buttons

Locks all the dices

next_player()[source]

The current player is changed to the next one.

Shows the keep dices and reset dices buttons

Shows the play again button

throw_unselected_dices()[source]

Throws all the unlocked(unselected) dices

unlock_all_dices()[source]

Unlocks and uncounts all the dices

unlock_dices()[source]

Unlocks all the dices

class kostky.Button(text, color=(0, 0, 0, 255), back_color=(108, 140, 191, 255), width=150.0, height=74.9952, x=832.0, y=296.0, visible=True, unlocked=True)[source]

Bases: object

Class that defines all of the buttons

Parameters:

  • text (string) – text on the button

  • color (color) – color of the text

  • back_color (color) – color of the button

  • width (int) – width of the button

  • height (int) – height of the button

  • x (int) – x coordinates of the button

  • y (int) – y coordinates of the button

  • visible (bool) – True if the button is visible, False if it is not

  • unlocked (bool) – True if you can click the button, False if u cant

draws all the visible buttons

hide()[source]

hides the next player buttons

show()[source]

shows the next player buttons

class kostky.Dice(x, y, value, selected=False, counted=False, locked=False)[source]

Bases: object

Class that defines all the dices

Parameters:

  • x (int) – x coordinates of the button

  • y (int) – y coordinates of the button

  • value (int) – the value of the dice

  • selected (bool) – True if the dice is selected, False if it is not

  • counted (bool) – True if the dice is counted, False if it is not

  • locked (bool) – True if the dice is locked, False if it is not

SIZE = 0.08
animation()[source]

Gives the dice a random number and draws them.

dice_imgs = {'locked_imgs': {1: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 2: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 3: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 4: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 5: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 6: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>}, 'unlocked_imgs': {1: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 2: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 3: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 4: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 5: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>, 6: <Surface(102x102x32 SW)>}}
draw()[source]

If the dice you clicked on is not selected, it changes the img to be the selected one and vice versa.

rolldice()[source]

Checks if the dice is locked or not, if not it calls animation to roll the dice.

class kostky.KeepDiceButton(text, color=(0, 0, 0, 255), back_color=(108, 140, 191, 255), width=150.0, height=74.9952, x=832.0, y=296.0, visible=True, unlocked=True)[source]

Bases: Button

action()[source]

If the button is visible, switches to the next player and doesn’t reset the dices. Keep the temporary score.

get_start(x, y)[source]

Gets coordinates of the click of the mouse and checks if the click is on a button. If it is it returns what button it is on.

Parameters:

  • x (int) – x coordinates of the click

  • y (int) – y coordinates of the click

Returns:

If the click is inside the rectangle, return True

Return type:

Bool

Example:

get_start(), return True

class kostky.NextPlayerButton(text, color=(0, 0, 0, 255), back_color=(108, 140, 191, 255), width=150.0, height=74.9952, x=832.0, y=296.0, visible=True, unlocked=True)[source]

Bases: Button

action()[source]

Checks if the button is unlocked, if yes it checks the combination of the dices with the rules. If it returns a value it adds the value to the temporary score and adds the temporary score to the players score, switches to the next player and displays the next player buttons. If the player has achieved 10000 points it will end the game. If the rules don’t return a value it resets the dices and switches to the next player.

class kostky.PlayAgainButton(text, color=(0, 0, 0, 255), back_color=(108, 140, 191, 255), width=150.0, height=74.9952, x=832.0, y=296.0, visible=True, unlocked=True)[source]

Bases: Button

action()[source]

If the button is visible, it resets the board and send the player back to the menu.

class kostky.ThrowButton(text, color=(0, 0, 0, 255), back_color=(108, 140, 191, 255), width=150.0, height=74.9952, x=832.0, y=296.0, visible=True, unlocked=True)[source]

Bases: Button

action()[source]

If the selected dices are allowed by the rules it throws all the unselected dices

sound()[source]

Plays a random sound of rolling dices

write_dice_to_score()[source]

Takes the score from the value of the dices and adds it to the temporary score.
